Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory310.png'}

{3: 'Navigating through the labyrinth of alleys and dim pathways, the two of you walk quite a distance toward the city. Eventually, you arrive at a spot beside a massive sewer exit adorned with colorful graffiti.'}
{2: '...', 3: '5', 4: 'Are you sure this is the right spot?', 5: '5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Quirky collectors always have their odd quirks, don't they?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Anyway, I bumped into him around here last time, and he mentioned he lived nearby, so we should be able to find him at this hour.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, why exactly did you come to a place like this...?', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Because they asked me to check on Constellia's pipeline... Here he is!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A somewhat familiar mechanoid figure staggers toward you from a distance.'}
{3: "Before you stands none other than the awakened machine Kiske, who had previously invited you to fill in as his band's drummer."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant! Long time no see!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "We haven't had the chance to treat you to some gas-booze at Vasi's!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Kiske cheerfully.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hold on, save your gas-booze for later...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've brought the commandant as promised. So, can you sell me those wireless headphones now?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'We had a deal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'A few days back, this Construct lady took a liking to one of my collectibles—a pair of limited-edition Golden Age wireless headphones.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "But I wasn't keen on selling it to her then, so I set a condition: she could have it only if she brought the Gray Raven Commandant over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Is it really okay to spill all the beans like that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Mechanoids don't lie. I thought it would be a very challenging task for a Construct, but I didn't expect...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't tell me all you did yesterday...", 3: '33'}
{3: 'She turns her head and begins to hum a tune, seemingly oblivious to your words.'}
{2: 'But since when did you become a collector?', 3: '38'}
{3: 'During your previous encounter, Kiske was still a member of the "Thunder Sparks" band.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: 'We awakened machines are free and chase after whatever we desire.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'So, I can be a band member or a collector.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Anyway, I've met your condition...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, where are the wireless headphones you promised?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "I don't know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Because I have changed my pursuit in a new direction! I am a free... painter today!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'From now on, I will join the ranks of painters! To become a new! Beat painter!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid cheerfully waves his hands.'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Yo! A great painter! Who makes beats!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Commandant... Say, if an awakened machine ditches a deal, and I sneak in a tiny virus to mess with its circuits...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'A great... painter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Constellia won't give me any trouble for that, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ahem.', 3: '64', 4: "I didn't see anything.", 5: '64'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "...Don't threaten a promising beat painter. I will tell you the truth.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kiske stops his dance.'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Those wireless headphones are no longer with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'You sold them to someone else?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'No, we awakened machines always keep our word, but... yesterday, we lost to another group of awakened machines in a music showdown.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'They took all of my collections.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "I'm done with music. I'm thinking of changing careers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'To become a great beat—painter!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hold on for a moment...', 3: '78', 4: "What's going on?", 5: '78'}
{3: 'As far as you remember, Thunder Sparks should be a quite renowned band in Constellia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "The competition was about something Thunder Sparks wasn't skilled in, a music genre that was new to us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...So, what genre was it exactly?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'It\'s a popular Golden Age music genre called "mashup".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Their speed was incredible. We tried our best but still couldn't keep up with their beat at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Thunder Sparks was defeated, and those awakened machines said we weren't even worthy of the competition, then they took all our collections...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Including the wireless headphones that you wanted, Construct Lady. I'm sorry. I didn't mean to deceive you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The awakened machine gives a polite bow to Teddy.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...No need to be so uptight about it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "If you want the headphones, you will have to buy a pair from them, but they don't seem like the type to care about collections.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hmm... What a hassle.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, what kind of mashup did that band use to beat you? Can you show it to me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "It's something like this...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before starting it, Kiske stealthily turns the volume down to the lowest setting on his built-in player.'}
{3: 'A lively melody and deep harmony seamlessly blend into a single track of music.'}
{3: 'The drummer in the band appears skilled at modulating transitions, allowing this track to flawlessly integrate various melodies with different sounds.'}
{2: '...Is this what they call a mashup?', 3: '104', 4: 'Such complex music.', 5: '104'}
{3: "The melody and harmony flow smoothly from beginning to end. It sounds like something that a single band couldn't possibly perform all at once."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "They called this the newest form of electronic music and said that we couldn't perform it because we were noobs.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Kiske', 3: "That's how Thunder Sparks ended up getting defeated—it was completely out of our capability. We've attempted to learn more melodies, but mastering such harmony requires a lot of time and effort.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid sighs with a long face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, if I help you beat those mechanoids and get your band back together, you can reclaim all your collections—including MY headphones, is that right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: '...For real?! Are you really going to help us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You can trust her.', 3: '117', 4: 'Probably, yeah.', 5: '115'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hey, I told you that you gotta trust the technicians.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "That's just... fantastic!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'On behalf of Thunder Sparks, I thank you! Kind-hearted Construct Lady!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "However, I've got another condition. You know, this comes with an additional cost...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct squints her eyes and leans in to whisper something to Kiske.'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Ah... Is that so? It's not something expensive, but it might be hard to find...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "I'll do my best!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Well, you have my thanks in advance.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'What is it?', 4: 'What are you talking about?'}
{3: 'Squinting her eyes, the girl shows you a faint smile.'}
